title: Bug 17423: Revert appears twice in the popup menu
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Popup the menu. One is located after UNDO and the other is located before FORMAT.
EB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Popup the menu. Only one Revert option should be present in the menu, either after UNDO or before FORMAT.
SR: Ensure that the Revert option in the popup menu is only displayed once and is placed correctly either after UNDO or before FORMAT.
